LanguageData.Joris_The_Ripper.label: Joris The Ripper
LanguageData.Joris_The_Ripper.description: Possessing incredible superbear strenght, speen and endurance. Joris the Ripper is nigh indestructible due to the parts of his body made entirely out of plasteel and nanites laced muscles. He's often seen with a sword... But not on his.
